item.title: Justin Sun: Will Buy $10M Worth of WLFI and ALTS Each
item.description: On September 5th, Justin Sun made a post on social media, expressing that "We hold the view that U.S.-listed crypto stocks are undervalued. I am going to purchase $10 million worth of ALTS and $10 million worth of WLFI in the market."

item.title: ArkStream Capital has announced that it has made an additional investment of $10 million in Ethena Labs.
item.description: On September 5th, according to official information, ArkStream Capital declared that in August 2025, they made an extra investment of $10 million in Ethena Labs. Previously, they had invested $5 million in December 2024.

item.title: Wildcat Protocol Developer Completes $3.5M Seed Extension Round, Led by Robot Ventures
item.description: September 5th. As reported by The Block, the developer of lending protocol Wildcat, Wildcat Labs, has completed a $3.5 million seed extension round of financing. This round was led by Robot Ventures, and Triton Capital, Polygon Ventures, Safe Foundation, Hyperithm, Hermeneutic Investments, Kronos Research, and angel investors such as Fei Protocol co-founder Joey Santoro, Vyper core contributor Charles Cooper, and Ink founder Andrew Koller also participated.Wildcat co-founder and CEO Laurence Day mentioned that this financing round adopted a Simple Agreement for Future Equity (SAFE) structure. After the round, Wildcat Labs was valued at $35 million, and investors obtained a 10% stake. This fundraising round has brought Wildcat Labs' total funding to $5.3 million. The new funds will be utilized to more deeply integrate the Wildcat protocol into the Ethereum DeFi ecosystem and expand access to a broader audience by bringing the private credit market onto the blockchain.

item.title: Oxford Economics: The Federal Reserve is expected to cut interest rates by 50 basis points in 2025, with the next rate cut expected to take place in September
item.description: September 5th: According to the Oxford Economics Institute, it is expected that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates by 50 basis points in 2025, and the next rate cut is expected to occur in September. (FX168)

item.title: SEC and CFTC will discuss introducing Perpetual Contracts to the US domestic market, DeFi Innovation Waiver, and other topics
item.description: On September 5th, as per an official announcement, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) issued a joint statement. They announced that they will hold a roundtable on September 29, 2025. The purpose of this roundtable is to discuss regulatory coordination in order to support innovative products such as cryptocurrency, decentralized finance (DeFi), prediction markets, perpetual contracts, and portfolio margin trading.The two agencies stated that with the increasing integration of the securities and commodity derivatives markets, coordinating regulatory frameworks and reducing regulatory gaps are crucial for market innovation. The previously released joint statement on spot cryptocurrency products was just the first step. The SEC and CFTC will explore unified product and trading venue definitions, simplify reporting and data standards, coordinate capital and margin requirements, and leverage innovative exemption mechanisms

item.title: The three major U.S. stock indices all hit intraday record highs after the opening bell.
item.description: September 5th. Based on market data, all three major U.S. stock indexes hit intraday record highs after the opening. (Golden Ten)

item.title: Trump Media & Technology Group: Has Acquired Approximately 2% of CRO Circulating Supply
item.description: On September 5th, as per globenewswire, Trump Media & Technology Group made an announcement today. It has successfully completed the previously declared acquisition agreement with Crypto.com.Under this agreement, Trump Media & Technology Group will obtain 6.844 billion Cronos (CRO) tokens at a price of roughly $0.153 per token. The transaction will be carried out through a 50% stock and 50% cash exchange with Crypto.com. These tokens account for about 2% of the current circulating CRO supply (in addition, the CRO Strategy Company of Trump Media & Technology Group will acquire approximately 19% of the circulating CRO).Trump Media & Technology Group will place its CRO under the institutional-grade custody service of Crypto.com, namely Crypto.com Custody. This enables Trump Media & Technology Group to earn additional yields through token staking. The stocks of Trump Media & Technology Group and the CRO tokens exchanged in the transaction will be subject to lock-up periods.

item.title: The SEC and CFTC will jointly host a roundtable discussion on September 29, focusing on crypto asset regulation coordination.
item.description: On September 5th, according to official channels, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) issued a joint statement today. It was announced that on September 29, 2025, from 1:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. Eastern Time (ET), they will jointly hold a roundtable discussion to explore opportunities for regulatory coordination.SEC Chairman Paul S. Atkins and CFTC Acting Chairman Caroline D. Pham stated that through close cooperation, they will bring clarity to the market and make use of the unique U.S. regulatory structure to the benefit of market participants, investors, and the public.The statement pointed out that the previous joint staff statement on products involving digital assets was only the first step. The two agencies will consider coordinating product and trading platform definitions, simplifying reporting and data standards, unifying capital and margin frameworks, and establishing a coordinated innovation exemption mechani

item.title: Analyst: Fed Rate Cut in September Unlikely to Be Derailed by Worsening Inflation Data
item.description: On September 5th, Analyst Chris Anstey stated that prior to the Non-Farm Payrolls report, the market had fully factored in a Fed rate cut two weeks later. In order to dissuade traders from this expectation, it might require extremely strong job growth data along with a high CPI report. Nevertheless, this job report might have already solidified the rate cut expectation, even if the forthcoming CPI indicates escalating inflation. (FXStreet)

item.title: Binance Alpha will list Black Mirror (MIRROR) and open airdrop claim for eligible users
item.description: On September 5th, according to official channels, Binance Alpha is scheduled to list Black Mirror (MIRROR) on September 8th. After Alpha trading commences, eligible users can access the Alpha event page to claim an airdrop by using Binance Alpha points. Further details will be disclosed later.
